Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Chronic administration of LF strongly reduced the blood pressure and production of ROS and improved antioxidant capacity in Dex - induced hypertension , suggesting the role of inhibition of oxidative stress as another mechanism of antihypertensive action of LF .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| LF (Lipoic Acid) |
| ROS (Reactive Oxygen Species) |
| Dex (Dexamethasone) |

These are the valid chemical entities identified in the paragraph. Lipoic Acid (LF), Reactive Oxygen Species (ROS), and Dexamethasone (Dex) are the precise entities mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Lipoic Acid (LF) |
| Reactive Oxygen Species (ROS) |

These are the valid chemical entities identified in the paragraph. Lipoic Acid (LF) and Reactive Oxygen Species (ROS) are the precise chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph. Other entities such as "chronic administration," "blood pressure," "production," "antioxidant capacity," "suggesting," "role," "another mechanism," "antihypertensive action," and "LF" (when it is mentioned as the name of the substance being administered) do not clearly refer to chemicals.
